dim = 4096
n_layersÂ =32

div.div:
freqs
= torch.outer(m, theta)
seq_len (*) head_dim/2 -> (seq_len, head_dim/2)

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 428px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1133px; margin-left: 1481px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 18px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
freqs_complex
= torch.polar(
abs = ones_like(freqs), angle = freqs)
(seq_len, head_dim/2)

div.i:
x: (B, 1, dim)
start_pos = int
freqs_complex: (seq_len, head_dim/2)

div.div:
h = x + attn.forward(
attention_norm(x)
, start_pos, freqs_complex)
(B, 1, dim)

div.span:
_norm = x * torch.rsqrt (
x.pow(2).mean(-1, keepdim=True) +Â eps)
(B, 1, dim) * (B, 1, 1) -> (B, 1, dim) (broadcasting!)

div.div:
xq
= self.wq(x)
xk
= self.wk(x)
xv
= self.wv(x)
(B, 1, dim) -> (B, 1, n_heads_(q/kv) * head_dim)

div.div:
xq = xq.view(B, 1, n_heads_q, head_dim)
Similarly xk, xv
(B, 1, n_heads_(q/kv), head_dim)
